document.full_text: in a sign of u.s. confidence that the weeklong assault on libya has tamed moammar gadhafi's air defenses, the pentagon has reduced the amount of naval firepower arrayed against him, officials said sunday.
document.title: us reducing naval firepower aimed at gadhafi
lines_and_colors: in a sign of u.s. confidence that the weeklong assault on libya has tamed moammar gadhafi's air defenses, the pentagon has reduced the amount of naval firepower arrayed against him, officials said sunday.
